name: Space Quest (mary gerik)
description:
Project description

Space Adventure is an action adventure game built for the PC, where the player takes the role of a space cadet who must traverse their ship and complete various quests. Fight enemies and collect goodies as you make your way through this adventure in space!

This was a solo project done for a video game scripting class. 

Asset credits
